name.en: Feast of the Assumption of Mary

teaser.de: Erleben Sie Manarolawertigste religiöse Tradition mit Prozession durch die Dorfstraßen.
teaser.en: Experience Manarola's most sacred tradition with procession through the village streets.
teaser.fr: Découvrez la tradition la plus sacrée de Manarola avec la procession dans les rues du village.
teaser.it: Vivi la tradizione più sacra di Manarola con la processione per le vie del borgo.

description.de: Das wichtigste religiöse Fest in Manarola zu Ehren Maria Himmelfahrt mit Prozession und traditionellen Feierlichkeiten.
description.en: The most important religious celebration in Manarola, honoring the Assumption of the Virgin Mary with procession and traditional festivities.
description.fr: La plus importante célébration religieuse de Manarola en l'honneur de l'Assomption de la Vierge Marie avec procession et festivités traditionnelles.
description.it: La più importante celebrazione religiosa di Manarola in onore dell'Assunzione della Vergine Maria con processione e festeggiamenti tradizionali.

seo_description.de: Nehmen Sie am traditionellen Fest Maria Himmelfahrt in Manarola am 15. August teil. Erleben Sie authentische ligurische religiöse Traditionen.
seo_description.en: Join the traditional Feast of the Assumption in Manarola on August 15th. Experience authentic Ligurian religious traditions in Cinque Terre.
seo_description.fr: Participez à la traditionnelle Fête de l'Assomption à Manarola le 15 août. Découvrez les traditions religieuses ligures authentiques.
seo_description.it: Partecipa alla tradizionale Festa della Madonna Assunta a Manarola il 15 agosto. Vivi autentiche tradizioni religiose liguri.

atmosphere.de: Festliche Freiluftfeier zwischen den berühmten Terrassenweinbergen mit Panoramablick aufs Meer
atmosphere.en: Festive outdoor celebration among the famous terraced vineyards with panoramic sea views

atmosphere.it: Celebrazione festosa all'aperto tra i famosi vigneti terrazzati con vista panoramica sul mare

description.de: Traditionelles Weinerntefest zur Feier des Endes der Wachstumsperiode mit Weinverkostung, Traubenstampfen und lokalen Spezialitäten.
description.en: Traditional grape harvest festival celebrating the end of growing season with wine tasting, grape stomping, and local food specialties.

description.it: Tradizionale festa della vendemmia che celebra la fine della stagione di crescita con degustazioni di vino, pigiatura dell'uva e specialità locali.

location.address: Via di Corniglia, 19017 Manarola SP, Italy

seo_description.de: Erleben Sie Manaroladles Weinernte-Fest im September. Weinverkostung und Traubenstampfen in den berühmten Terrassenweinbergen.
seo_description.en: Experience Manarola's traditional harvest festival in September. Wine tasting and grape stomping in the famous Cinque Terre terraced vineyards.
seo_description.fr: Découvrez le festival traditionnel des vendanges de Manarola en septembre. Dégustation de vin et foulage du raisin dans les célèbres vignobles en terrasses.
seo_description.it: Vivi la tradizionale festa della vendemmia di Manarola a settembre. Degustazioni di vino e pigiatura dell'uva nei famosi vigneti terrazzati.

insider_tips.de: Früh ankommen für die besten Aussichten und beim traditionellen Traubenstampfen mitmachen
insider_tips.en: Arrive early for the best views and participate in traditional grape stomping
insider_tips.fr: Arrivez tôt pour les meilleures vues et participez au foulage traditionnel du raisin
insider_tips.it: Arriva presto per le migliori viste e partecipa alla tradizionale pigiatura dell'uva

atmosphere.de: Magische Weihnachtsatmosphäre mit kerzenbeleuchteten Straßen und traditionellen Liedern
atmosphere.en: Magical Christmas atmosphere with candlelit streets and traditional carols
atmosphere.fr: Atmosphère magique de Noël avec des rues éclairées aux bougies et des chants traditionnels
atmosphere.it: Atmosfera natalizia magica con strade illuminate a candela e canti tradizionali

description.de: Traditionelle lebende Krippe, aufgeführt von örtlichen Bewohnern in den Dorfstraßen während der Weihnachtszeit, mit authentischen historischen Kostümen.
description.en: Traditional living nativity scene performed by local residents throughout the village streets during the Christmas season, featuring authentic period costumes.

description.it: Presepe vivente tradizionale interpretato dai residenti locali nelle vie del borgo durante il periodo natalizio, con costumi d'epoca autentici.

seo_title.it: Presepe Vivente Manarola 2024 - Evento Natalizio Cinque Terre

seo_description.de: Erleben Sie Manarolasische lebende Krippe vom 24. Dezember bis 6. Januar. Traditionelle Weihnachtsfeier in den Dorfstraßen.
seo_description.en: Experience Manarola's magical Living Nativity Scene from December 24 to January 6. Traditional Christmas celebration in Cinque Terre village streets.
seo_description.fr: Découvrez la magique Crèche Vivante de Manarola du 24 décembre au 6 janvier. Célébration de Noël traditionnelle dans les rues du village.
seo_description.it: Vivi il magico Presepe Vivente di Manarola dal 24 dicembre al 6 gennaio. Celebrazione natalizia tradizionale nelle vie del borgo.

highlights.de: Authentische Pesto-Herstellung mit Marmormörser lernen, traditionelle Focaccia-Backtechniken, Weinpaarung
highlights.en: Learn authentic pesto making with marble mortar, traditional focaccia baking techniques, wine pairing
highlights.fr: Apprenez la préparation authentique du pesto au mortier de marbre, techniques traditionnelles de cuisson de la focaccia, accord des vins
highlights.it: Impara la preparazione autentica del pesto con mortaio di marmo, tecniche tradizionali di panificazione della focaccia, abbinamento vini

description.de: Praktischer Kochkurs zum Erlernen traditioneller ligurischer Spezialitäten einschließlich frischem Pesto, Focaccia col formaggio und lokalen Meeresfrüchte-Gerichten.
description.en: Hands-on cooking class learning to make traditional Ligurian specialties including fresh pesto, focaccia col formaggio, and local seafood dishes.
description.fr: Cours de cuisine pratique pour apprendre à préparer les spécialités liguriennes traditionnelles incluant pesto frais, focaccia col formaggio et plats de poisson locaux.
description.it: Corso di cucina pratico per imparare a preparare specialità liguri tradizionali inclusi pesto fresco, focaccia col formaggio e piatti di pesce locali.

seo_title.de: Kochkurs Manarola 2024 - Pesto Focaccia Kurs Cinque Terre

seo_title.it: Corso Cucina Manarola 2024 - Corso Pesto Focaccia Cinque Terre

seo_description.de: Lernen Sie traditionelle ligurische Küche in Manarola. Praktische Pesto- und Focaccia-Kurse mit lokalen Zutaten und Weinpaarung.
seo_description.en: Learn traditional Ligurian cooking in Manarola. Hands-on pesto and focaccia making classes with local ingredients and wine pairing.
seo_description.fr: Apprenez la cuisine ligurienne traditionnelle à Manarola. Cours pratiques de pesto et focaccia avec ingrédients locaux et accord des vins.
seo_description.it: Impara la cucina ligure tradizionale a Manarola. Corsi pratici di pesto e focaccia con ingredienti locali e abbinamento vini.

insider_tips.de: Früh buchen, da Kurse schnell ausgebucht sind, Abendessen mit den zubereiteten Gerichten inbegriffen
insider_tips.en: Book early as classes fill quickly, includes dinner with your prepared dishes
insider_tips.fr: Réservez tôt car les cours se remplissent rapidement, inclut le dîner avec vos plats préparés
insider_tips.it: Prenota in anticipo perché i corsi si riempiono velocemente, include cena con i piatti preparati

atmosphere.de: Intime Freiluft-Kulisse mit dramatischer Küstenkulisse und außergewöhnlicher Akustik
atmosphere.en: Intimate outdoor setting with dramatic coastal backdrop and exceptional acoustics
atmosphere.fr: Cadre intime en plein air avec toile de fond côtière dramatique et acoustique exceptionnelle
atmosphere.it: Ambiente intimo all'aperto con drammatico sfondo costiero e acustica eccezionale

description.de: Magische Freiluft-Opernaufführung in natürlicher Amphitheater-Kulisse mit renommierten italienischen Opernsängern, die klassische Arien unter dem Sternenhimmel aufführen.

description.fr: Représentation d'opéra magique en plein air dans un cadre d'amphithéâtre naturel, avec des chanteurs d'opéra italiens renommés interprétant des arias classiques sous un ciel étoilé.
description.it: Magica rappresentazione operistica all'aperto in un anfiteatro naturale, con rinomati cantanti lirici italiani che eseguono arie classiche sotto il cielo stellato.

location.address: Via di Corniglia, 19017 Manarola SP, Italy

what_to_bring.de: Leichte Jacke für Abendkühle, Kissen zum Sitzen, kein Blitzlicht während der Aufführung

seo_description.de: Entdecken Sie lokale Kunst in Manarolasstellung. Originalgemälde, Fotografie und Skulpturen inspiriert von Cinque Terre-Landschaften.
seo_description.en: Discover local art at Manarola's summer exhibition. Original paintings, photography and sculptures inspired by Cinque Terre landscapes.

highlights.it: Degustazione guidata di 3-5 annate di Sciacchetrà, tour del vigneto, abbinamenti con formaggi locali

description.de: Professionelle Weinverkostungen mit Fokus auf den seltenen Sciacchetrà-Dessertwein, hergestellt aus getrockneten Trauben von Manarolailen Terrassen.
description.en: Professional wine tasting sessions focusing on the rare Sciacchetrà dessert wine, made from dried grapes grown on Manarola's steep terraces.

details.history: Started in 1961 when Mario Andreoli lit three lights on a cross to honor a promise to his dying father. Over 60 years, he expanded it into a masterpiece using his railway worker skills and recycled materials including iron, windows, old signs, and tanks.

organizer.name: Associazione Presepe di Manarola Mario Andreoli

details.significance: World's largest lighted nativity scene, symbol of dedication, community, and sustainable art. Represents the dialogue between human creativity and the wine landscape.
details.description_long: Created by retired railway worker Mario Andreoli starting in 1961, this extraordinary nativity scene cascades down the hillside above Manarola. With over 300 life-sized figures made entirely from recycled materials and illuminated by more than 17,000 lights powered by renewable energy, it entered the Guinness World Records in 2007. The installation transforms the terraced vineyards into a stunning work of environmental art, blending faith, creativity, and sustainability. Andreoli dedicated his life to this project until his passing in 2022, and it continues through the Associazione Presepe di Manarola.
details.description_short: The world's largest illuminated nativity scene featuring over 300 figures and 17,000 lights spread across terraced hillside, created from recycled materials.

schedule_of_activities.activity: Opening of Oratory with photography exhibitions
CAI torchlight procession and authorities' greetings
Nativity scene lighting and fireworks (December 8 only)

location.venue_name: Collina delle Tre Croci (Hill of Three Crosses)
location.meeting_point: Main square Manarola or Via Beccara trail for best views

schedule.schedule_notes: Lit nightly from approximately 5:00 PM to 10:00 PM (until midnight on Sundays). Opening ceremony with fireworks on December 8.
schedule.recurrence_pattern: Daily from December 8 to end of January/early February

cons: Requires climbing steps for best view

attendance.peak_hours: Opening night December 8 and weekend evenings
attendance.best_arrival_time: Arrive before 17:00 to secure good viewing spot, especially on opening night

parking.notes: No parking in Manarola. Use La Spezia parking and take train.

practical_info.what_to_wear: Warm winter clothing, sturdy shoes for uneven terrain and steps

accessibility.accessibility_notes: Best viewing requires climbing 170-320 steps on Via Beccara trail. Can be viewed from main square but with limited view.

public_transport.train_service: Manarola station on Cinque Terre line, frequent service

tickets_pricing.price_notes: Completely free to view from public viewing areas

weather_contingency.rain_policy: Operates in most weather, but trail may be dangerous when wet

avoid: Opening night if you dislike crowds
Rainy evenings when trail is slippery
combine_with: Visit during day to see figures up close
insider_tips: Climb to highest viewing area (320 steps) on Via Beccara for best panoramic view
Bring flashlight - trail has no lighting at night
Visit on December 8 for opening ceremony and fireworks
Best photos from Via Beccara viewpoints, not main square
Go on weeknight to avoid weekend crowds
best_viewing_spots: Via Beccara trail - three viewing areas at 170, 250, and 320 steps
